byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS, MAGGIE HABERMAN and ASHLEY PARKER

abstract: Donald J Trump draws intense criticism from both fellow Republicans and Democratic leaders after he ridicules appearance of Khizr and Ghazala Khan, Muslim Americans who lost their son during military service in Iraq, at Democratic National Convention; Trump is seeing no empathy for his claims on Twitter that Khizr Khan viciously attacked him, and episode may prove to be one of biggest crises of his presidential campaign to date.

headline.print_headline: Trump Struggles in Feud With Fallen G.I.’s Family
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Confrontation With Muslim Soldier’s Parents Emerges as Unexpected Flash Point

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Mr. Trump faced criticism from Democrats and Republicans over his rough and racially charged dismissal of Khizr and Ghazala Khan, who appeared at the Democratic convention....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump faced criticism from Democrats and Republicans over his rough and racially charged dismissal of Khizr and Ghazala Khan, who appeared at the Democratic convention.
